content:
This is the One-Day-Later-Than-Usual Edition of the Weekly Edition of the Edition Updates:

  • Prelude changes in FCP, finishing in two days.
  • Upgraded lints: PR merged.
  • All other changes already accepted/merged/fcp'd.
  • Blog post later today :tada:

Implementation work still left to do:

  • Prelude migration lint
  • Reserved prefixed literals: Both implementation and migration lint
  • IntoIter for arrays: done, but lots of small improvements to the lint and documentation still need to be made
  • Rustfix support for multiple spans (probably just needs a revert of a revert)
  • Some kind of --force-warn to override allow for migration lints for cargo fix --edition.
  • Disjoint captures: Nearing completion, see the rfc 2229 project board.
